bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press the power button until you see the boot menu and using the volume buttons, select Fastboot from the menu and press the power button to confirm

reboot_to_recovery.title: Reboot to Bootloader
reboot_to_recovery.description: With the device powered off, press the power button until you see the boot menu and using the volume buttons, select Fastboot from the menu and press the power button to confirm

treblize_device.title: Treblize the device
treblize_device.description: Reboot into recovery, then go to Advanced -> Terminal and run the command `treblize`. Then reboot back into recovery.

install_firmware.title: Install latest firmware
install_firmware.description: Install the latest firmware (9.0.6) onto your device from https://github.com/nvertigo/firmware-3t/tree/master/archive NOTE: Firmwares are device specific, so be sure to install the correct one depending on if you have a OnePlus 3 or 3T.

install_lineage_treble.title: Install LineageOS 16 treble build
install_lineage_treble.description: Install the LineageOS 16 treble build from https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=15cy1Pxjl3DIXzGhwEpiCiu3BqlE6ZkaW&confirm=true and then reboot boot into the OS once, then reboot back into recovery.

wipe_partitions.title: Wipe partitions
wipe_partitions.description: In recovery, go to Wipe -> Advanced Wipe, then select everything except Vendor and USB-OTG and then Swipe to Wipe. Now reboot back into recovery.
